hero.title: AI-Powered Customer Support
hero.subtitle: Made Simple
hero.description: Transform your customer service with intelligent chatbots that understand your business and provide instant, accurate responses 24/7.
hero.free_trial: Start your free trial today - no credit card required

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Customer Support?
cta.description: Join thousands of businesses already using our AI-powered solutions to provide better customer experiences.

features.title: Everything You Need for Modern Customer Support
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you provide exceptional customer service

0.title: 24/7 Availability
0.description: Your AI assistant never sleeps, providing instant responses to customer queries around the clock.

1.title: Smart Knowledge Base
1.description: Automatically learn from your documents, FAQs, and website content to provide accurate answers.

2.title: Analytics & Insights
2.description: Track conversation performance, customer satisfaction, and identify areas for improvement.

3.title: Secure & Compliant
3.description: Enterprise-grade security with GDPR compliance and data protection built-in.

4.title: Easy Integration
4.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing website, CRM, and support tools.

5.title: Flexible Pricing
5.description: Choose the plan that fits your business needs with transparent, scalable pricing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI customer support platform
faq.question_1: How quickly can I get started?
faq.answer_1: You can have your AI assistant up and running in under 10 minutes. Simply upload your content, customize the appearance, and embed the widget on your website.
faq.question_2: What types of content can the AI learn from?
faq.answer_2: Our AI can learn from PDFs, Word documents, web pages, FAQs, and even existing support tickets. It supports multiple languages and formats.
faq.answer_3: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption. We're GDPR compliant and your data is never shared with third parties.
faq.question_4: Can I customize the chatbot's appearance?
faq.answer_4: Absolutely! You can customize colors, fonts, messages, and even add your company logo to match your brand perfectly.
faq.question_5: What if the AI doesn't know an answer?
faq.answer_5: When the AI doesn't have an answer, it can seamlessly transfer the conversation to a human agent or collect contact information for follow-up.
faq.question_6: Do you offer support and training?
faq.answer_6: Yes, we provide comprehensive onboarding, training materials, and dedicated support to help you get the most out of your AI assistant.
